bug.short_desc: Do not require valgrind on MIPS

long_desc.thetext:
Created attachment 1122446 Disable-valgrind-on-MIPS.patch
Description of problem: We are trying to bring Fedora to MIPS platform and this requires updating libibverbs specfile not to require valgrind. At this momenr valgrind does not work properly with the ABIs we are building. We can reenable the dependency once a working valgrind package is built.
Actual results: libibverbs requires valgrind-devel on MIPS
Expected results: libibverbs does not require valgrind-devel on MIPS
Additional info: Attaching dist-git patch

This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 24 development cycle. Changing version to '24'.
More information and reason for this action is here: https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Fedora_Program_Management/HouseKeeping/Fedora24#Rawhide_Rebase
